p: Some studies analyzed the specific cellular targets of single components on the cells. Recent research demonstrated that linalool was not cytotoxic on some cell types (CC 50 > 200 μg/ml): Vero, Macrophages, A-549, HeLa, HT-29 cells Saulo [ 41] but can inhibit mitochondrial complexes I and II, increase reactive oxygen species and inhibit the HepG2 cells viability (IC 50=0.4 μM) [ 42].
